html:
Wherewith the servants... —Hebrew, נערי na‛ărēy—The ‘youth,’ or the young men. The word properly denotes boys, youths, young men; and is used here probably by way of disparagement, in contradistinction from an embassy that would be truly respectable, made up of aged men.

Have blasphemed me —God regarded these words as spoken against himself and he would vindicate his own honor and name.
